DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy bimatoprost/timolol fix combination ( GANfort® ) versus latanoprost ( Xalatan® ) patient open-angle glaucoma never previously treat high risk progression .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Bimatoprost/Timolol Fixed Combination Versus Latanoprost Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma Who Have Never Been Treated
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis primary openangle glaucoma never treat Visual Acuity 20/60 good eye Eye surgery within 3 month Any refractive eye surgery Contraindication betaadrenoceptor antagonist therapy ( eg , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease [ COPD ] , bronchial asthma , sinus bradycardia , heart block , history severe myocardial infarction [ heart attack ] ) Eye inflammation eye infection within 3 month Eye trauma within 6 month Oral , injectable , topical ophthalmic steroid within 21 day anticipate use study
